org.biosino.CHS.image
类 ChrRendering

java.lang.Object
  org.biosino.CHS.image.ChrRendering

public class ChrRendering
extends java.lang.Object

This class renders a chromosome, which is used to compare CHS between chromosomes.

构造函数摘要
ChrRendering(Chromosome chr, java.awt.Graphics2D g2, double range, double midLoc, double height, double y, int location)
          Create a new ChrRendering object.
 
方法摘要
 void drawChr()
          Draw the Chromosome object using a RoundRectangle2D.
 void drawCHS(ChrRendering other, CHS iCHS)
          Draw a CHS on the chromosome and link it with another chromosome.
 void drawName()
          Draw the name of the chromosome.
 void drawScale()
          Label the scales of the chromosome.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造函数详细信息

ChrRendering

public ChrRendering(Chromosome chr,
                    java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                    double range,
                    double midLoc,
                    double height,
                    double y,
                    int location)
Create a new ChrRendering object.

参数：
chr - the Chromosome object to be rendered
g2 - a Gaphics2D object representing the graphic device
range - the length of the chromosome in the image
midLoc - the x location of the middle point of the chromosome in the image.
height - the height of the chromosome
y - the y location of the chromosome
location - a value indicating which layer the chromosome should take up
方法详细信息

drawChr

public void drawChr()
Draw the Chromosome object using a RoundRectangle2D.

drawScale

public void drawScale()
Label the scales of the chromosome.

drawCHS

public void drawCHS(ChrRendering other,
                    CHS iCHS)
Draw a CHS on the chromosome and link it with another chromosome.

参数：
other - another ChrRendering object
iCHS - a CHS linking the two chromosomes

drawName

public void drawName()
Draw the name of the chromosome.
